original_text: And it came to pass, when he was come nigh to Bethphage and Bethany, at the mount called the mount of Olives, he sent two of his disciples,
korean_text: 감람원이라 불리는 산쪽에 있는 벳바게와 베다니에 가까이 가셨을 때에 제자 중 둘을 보내시며

sentences.original_text: when he was come nigh to Bethphage and Bethany
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 벳바게와 베다니에 가까이 이르렀을 때

sentences.original_text: at the mount called the mount of Olives
he sent two of his disciples
